# RoBERTa PyTorch Pre-Trained Models from Facebook AI

## Instructions

Add this notebook as a data source and add the following code cell to copy the content into PyTorch's cache directory:
```
!cp -r /kaggle/input/roberta-pytorch-pre-trained-models/torch /root/.cache/
```

From there, you can use the following code cell to load the model:
```
import torch
roberta = torch.hub.load('pytorch/fairseq', 'roberta.large')
```
